FuncDef: The display stp bridge command displays detailed information about the spanning tree of a bridge.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays detailed information about the spanning tree of the local bridge.
-

Displays detailed information about the spanning tree of the root bridge.
-

Examples: MSTID              Root ID  Root Cost Hello Max Forward Root Port
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If a device has many interfaces, running the display stp command displays a large amount of information, and it is difficult to find wanted information about the spanning trees of the root and local bridges.
To view detailed information about the spanning trees of the root and local bridges, run the display stp bridge command.
Precautions
If you run this command in the MSTP process view without specifying an MSTP process, information about the MSTP process in this view is displayed by default. If you run this command in the other view without specifying an MSTP process, information about MSTP process 0 is displayed by default.
